Need help reading this?

getURL

index.js

getURL

getURL(baseUrl: String, options.height: [Number], x: Number, y: Number, z: Number, options: [Object], layer: String): String
Parameters
baseUrl (String) Base url of the WMS server
options.height ([Number] (default '256') )
x (Number) Tile coordinate x
y (Number) Tile coordinate y
z (Number) Tile zoom
options ([Object])
Name Description
options.service [String] (default 'WMS')
options.version [String] (default '1.1.1')
options.request [String] (default 'GetMap')
options.srs [String] (default 'EPSG:3857')
options.width [Number] (default '256')
options.format [String] (default 'image/png')
layer (String) Layer name
Returns
String: url
Example
var baseUrl = 'http://geodata.state.nj.us/imagerywms/Natural2015';
var layer = 'Natural2015';
var url = whoots.getURL(baseUrl, layer, 154308, 197167, 19);

getTileBBox

index.js

getTileBBox

getTileBBox(x: Number, y: Number, z: Number): String
Parameters
x (Number) Tile coordinate x
y (Number) Tile coordinate y
z (Number) Tile zoom
Returns
String: String of the bounding box

getMercCoords

index.js

getMercCoords

getMercCoords(x: Number, y: Number, z: Number): Array
Parameters
x (Number) Pixel coordinate x
y (Number) Pixel coordinate y
z (Number) Tile zoom
Returns
Array: [x, y]
